attributes.action: Hold a General Election as soon as we safely can. (Public Vote of No Confidence)
attributes.additional_details: Going back to the lies of Brexit, and the struggles for our government to negotiate a deal that truly represented the needs of the people. We had the promises of more money to the NHS. Then there is the failure to keep us safe during COVID. How can we truly believe in staying inside and lockdown procedures when there has been numerous instances of MPs breaking lockdown protocol. And there is also the issues of the whole school meals farce during lockdown. Enough is enough. Boris Johnson must go.
attributes.background: The current UK Government has failed the people of the United Kingdom and Northern Ireland. We, The Undersigned demand that as soon as it safe to do so, that we hold a General Election and look to convene a new Government that can address the needs of the nation.
